Text: One report claimed it could take up to two weeks to repatriate all affected British tourists in a repatriation plan - dubbed Operation Matterhorn - that is reported to have a potential cost of £600million.
Cause: One report claimed it could take up to two weeks to repatriate all affected British tourists in a repatriation plan - dubbed Operation Matterhorn -
Sentence: <e1>One report claimed it could take up to two weeks to repatriate all affected British tourists in a repatriation plan - dubbed Operation Matterhorn -</e1> that is reported to have <e2>a potential cost of £600million.</e2>
